Description_lang: $?a443534[Advance to the $s1 Verses of Inner Radiance, reading as you are attacked.Inner Radiance increases your Critical Strike by $s2 and grants your attacks a chance to inflict an additional $s3 Radiant damage.][Advance to the $s1 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.Inner Resilience increases your armor by $s4 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs $s5 Magic damage.] When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.$?(a137048|a137028|a137023|a137010|a212613|a137008)[][|cnRED_FONT_COLOR:Valid only for tank specializations.|r]
